byline.original: By ALAN FEUER and MATT APUZZO

lead_paragraph: Discord between officials in New York and Washington is one factor slowing the investigation into the death of Mr. Garner, who died after being put in a police chokehold.

headline.print_headline: Prosecutors at Odds as Garner Case Drags On
headline.main: With Prosecutors at Odds, U.S. Inquiry Into Eric Garner’s Death Drags On

snippet: Discord between officials in New York and Washington is one factor slowing the investigation into the death of Mr. Garner, who died after being put in a police chokehold....
abstract: Long-running investigation into death of Eric Garner, who died in 2014 during confrontation with police on Staten Island sidewalk, has been stymied by complexities in federal civil rights law and desire among officials to move with caution in delicate matter; those involved in case say there is also uncertainty about whether there is enough evidence to proceed.
